Description: Thank you for taking the time to visit Leitz Music online store in Pensacola, Florida! Since 1970, Leitz Music Co. has been the trusted full line music instrument and audio dealer in Northwest Florida, carrying all the top tier brands. We are the go-to store for the regions working musicians, singer/songwriters, and audio engineers. Here at Leitz Music we are pleased to offer up this Les Paul Custom Pro Koa ! PLEASE don’t hesitate to contact us with any questions you might have or if you desire an in-hand description.A factory second is a guitar that won't have structural or playability issues, but could possibly have some particular minor cosmetic flaw which can keep it from passing the rigorous inspection process put in place by the guitar manufacturer. Commonly, the imperfections are so small they cannot be found. The flaw in guitar #2271 is difficult to find, the wood grain is lighter in the center of the top (see the photo spread). Nothing major, guitar plays and sounds great ! Leitz Music is honored to be an authorized Epiphone Dealer!The item photographed is the exact item to be sold and shipped.. Up for sale today is this awesome Les Paul Custom Pro and is in mint condition. FEATURES: Koa-topped mahogany body delivers a massive helping of warmth and richnessProBucker pickups give you hand-wound PAF tonesCoil splitting provides everything from spanky single-coil sounds to overwound humbucker tonesThe neck pickup's push/pull tone control affects the phase of the pickupsMahogany SlimTaper neck with rosewood fingerboard and Graph Tech nut is remarkably playableUpgraded hardware ensures better playability and tuning Tech SpecsBody Type:SolidbodyGuitar Weight 8lbsBody Shape:Les PaulLeft-/Right-handed:Right-handedNumber of Strings:6Body Material:Mahogany, boundTop Material:Figured KoaColor:NaturalNeck Material:MahoganyNeck Shape:1960's slim taper profileRadius:12"Fingerboard Material:RosewoodFingerboard Inlay:Pearloid blocksNumber of Frets:22, Medium JumboScale Length:24.75"Nut Width:1.6875"Nut Material:GraphtechBridge/Tailpiece:LockTone tune-o-matic bridge with stopbar tailpieceTuners:Grover gold 18:1 tuning machinesNeck Pickup:Epiphone ProBucker HumbuckerBridge Pickup:Epiphone ProBucker HumbuckerControls:2 x volume (push/pull coil-split), 2 x tone (push/pull phase switch neck control), 3-way toggle pickup switchManufacturer Part Number:ENCKNAGH3[SN # 2271] SHIPPING INFORMATION:Item will be shipped via best rate available FedEx or USPS. Expedited shipping is available by request at an additional cost.All items over $500 will require a signature for delivery."Free Shipping" applies only to the contiguous 48 states, and not to Alaska and Hawaii. ALL of our instruments at Leitz Music are professionally detailed and set up to industry standards by our instrument tech in store. We wish for your guitar to arrive in the most excellent condition possible and ready to play out of the box! Please note that temperature and humidity changes occurring during shipping may affect setup, and the responsibility of any desired changes to setup resides solely with the buyer of the instrument shipped. Most all customers are satisfied with setup upon arrival, but we understand that your playing needs may be different!
Title: Epiphone Les Paul Custom Pro Koa Electric Guitar Natural Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: Mint Condition.  No wear or tear. This guitar is a factory second, comes with all original paperwork and accessories.
